comments.content: You can try **[Arabolical (1)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125822/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Arabolical%20-%201&fid=63703180da67852a7ecf01c118869ed8&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=JUCA&fit=1)** free font by Geoffrey Johnston
